Html:
Is there an easy way to add scrolling to the photo album content list on the contents.aspx? If you have a large number of photos in the two columns available then the user must scroll down the page, click the photo thumbnail they desire and they return to the top of the page to see the larger rendention.Â  Would be nice to add a scroll bar or a way to return to the user to the top of the Selected Photo panel.

Any ideas?
